content: wavy waters baby blanket pattern by marnie macgregor mooy a simple reversible baby blanket with rippled squishy waves of knit and purl it s perfect for the water baby in your life sized to fit most cribs and playards it s just right for naps finished size 27 x 32 approximate you may adjust width by adding or subtracting multiples of 10 stitches and length by knitting more or fewer row to get desired length likewise different gauge and/or different weight yarn will yield a larger or smaller blanket materials approximately 650 yards worsted weight yarn sample shown was knit with one skein of red heart comfort prints 649 yards 340 g/12 oz with a few yards left over gauge 3 5 stitches per inch in garter stitch not too critical but will affect final measurements needles us 10 ½ / 6 5 mm or size needed to get your desired gauge instructions cast on 93 stitches using long tail cast on knit 20 row 10 garter ridges begin chart or use row-by-row instructions keeping first 10 and last 10 stitches in garter stitch to form border as charted / written you may wish to place markers after the first 10 and before the last 10 stitches to make it easier to see where the wave motif ends and the border begins as written there will be 7 full repeats of the wave pattern between the two borders repeat chart/pattern to desired length ending with either row 1 or row 5 sample blanket was 20
